title: Sawbones: Fentanyl and the ONEbox
description: If you havenâ€™t already been personally affected by a fentanyl overdose, you likely know someone who has. This week on Sawbones, Dr. Sydnee explores the rapid rise of fentanyl as a lethal street drug and what one West Virginia group is doing in hopes of turning the tide against overdose fatalities.Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers https://taxpayers.bandcamp.com/
author: Justin & Dr. Sydnee McElroy
